synopsis.text: Card Kingdom, a serene realm of enchantment, finds itself under threat from colossal, menacing chess pieces invading its tranquility. Standing between the kingdom and impending doom are the Crown Knights: a formidable quartet of skilled heroines, each possessing unique abilities. Sunday Spades, the enigmatic leader with a trump power shrouded in mystery; Jo Diamonds, the swift runner who can outpace light; Casa Clubs, the hyper-sensitive combat expert; and Coco Hearts, the cunning psycho-magic maestro. Can these charming, card-themed warriors outmaneuver the invincible war machines and safeguard their kingdom from annihilation? The stakes are high, and the odds may seem insurmountable, but the Crown Knights are ready to deal their best hand.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
